entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 09:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

Temperature: 3.8°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %

Wind: NE 21 km/h
